mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM file_index a INNER JOIN file_index b ON a.parent_id=b.file_index_id WHERE b.user_id=#{userId} AND b.path='/'
select * from file_index where user_id=#{userId} AND path='/'
select * from file_index where parent_id=#{fiId} and delete_flag is null
select * from file_index where user_id=#{userId} AND path=#{path}
select * from file_index where user_id=#{userId} AND p_file_index_id=#{pFileIndexId}
select * from file_index where path like concat(#{path},'/%') and user_id=#{userId}

SELECT a.file_index_id ,a.path FROM file_index a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id,path FROM file_index WHERE file_index_id=#{fileIndexId} )b ON a.user_id=b.user_id WHERE a.path NOT LIKE CONCAT(b.path,'%') AND a.is_file='1' AND a.delete_flag IS NULL
select * from file_index where name like concat('%',#{keyWord},'%')

SELECT user_id ,SUM(CASE WHEN NAME LIKE '%.jpg' OR NAME LIKE '%.png' OR NAME LIKE '%.gif' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) pic_number ,SUM(CASE WHEN NAME LIKE '%.mp4' OR NAME LIKE '%.avi' OR NAME LIKE '%.kvm' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) video_number ,SUM(CASE WHEN NAME LIKE '%.doc' OR NAME LIKE '%.xls' OR NAME LIKE '%.ppt' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) doc_number ,SUM(CASE WHEN NAME LIKE '%.java' OR NAME LIKE '%.php' OR NAME LIKE '%.html' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) code_number ,COUNT(1)-SUM(CASE WHEN NAME LIKE '%.jpg' OR NAME LIKE '%.png' OR NAME LIKE '%.gif' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) -SUM(CASE WHEN NAME LIKE '%.mp4' OR NAME LIKE '%.avi' OR NAME LIKE '%.kvm' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) -SUM(CASE WHEN NAME LIKE '%.doc' OR NAME LIKE '%.xls' OR NAME LIKE '%.ppt' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) -SUM(CASE WHEN NAME LIKE '%.java' OR NAME LIKE '%.php' OR NAME LIKE '%.html' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) other_number FROM file_index WHERE is_file='0' AND delete_flag IS NULL AND user_id=#{userId} GROUP BY user_id
